OOC: Naga is snake-like with humanoid torso and arms in bot mode. He<s 
still inside.

Bic: Naga knew the bugger would not move this easily, so he decided to 
take things in his hands. He slithered his way out and saw the 
intruder.

Naga: Hey you! You want to do something else than just stand there^ 
Mind just going away, or do you prefer to take a bite?
